content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. To get started, could I have your name, please?
Thank you, Mark. Could you provide your address so we can check if you’re in our service area?
Great, thank you. What kind of issue are you experiencing? Is it plumbing, electrical, or HVAC related?
It’s an HVAC issue. AC isn’t cooling right.
Thanks for letting me know, Mark. When would be a convenient time for one of our HVAC technicians to come out and take a look?
Actually, I think I’m going to try and fix it myself first. I’ll let you know if I need help. Thanks.
reason: Customer decided to attempt repair themselves.

content: No problem, Mark! If you need help in the future, don’t hesitate to reach out. Good luck with your repair!
reason: Customer decided to attempt repair themselves.
